text:
Microsoft - Redmond, WA, US

My team is working on a data access layer with underpinnings that support both tabular and nontabular data. It's currently used as the back-end for the Power Query addin to Excel (which ships as part of the next release of Office) and we're looking to increase our scope inside the company.

If you're interested in learning more, email me (curth at microsoft dot com) your resume.
